=== Current Position ===
(Left is decreasing x, Right is increasing x, Up is decreasing y, Down is increasing y)
(row = 7, col = 1)
=== Last Position ===
(row = 7, col = 1)

Given that the avatar's position has not changed, I need to analyze the surrounding state and decide on a meaningful action. The current position of the avatar is (7, 1), which is next to a box (7, 2), and there is a quick monster (#) at (7, 3). Moving in the direction of the box (to the right) would be risky because the monster is too close.

Thus, I need to avoid moving right, as it could lead to an encounter with the monster. The safest action will be to move left to (7, 0), which is a wall (w). Therefore, moving left will not help either. 

The recommended movement now is to rotate and then consider moving down to (8, 1), as that will avoid the immediate threat of the monster on the right while also getting closer to other possible actions around the boxes on the next row down.

``` Action:3 ``` 
Moving down to (8, 1) appears to be the safest choice, allowing me to reassess the environment and avoid immediate threats.
